trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Richland
There were no other sightings in Richland on or around April 16th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailshello i live in richland wa right outside of hanford,wa i saw a light floating across the sky right over the hanford area that looked like a 1000 watt high pressure sodium light. there did not appear to be any other light coming from this ship it was headed NE toword pasco in a slow calm spped no sound at all and then turned directly north and vanished into thin air like it went over or behind a hill in total clear weather. no other planes appear to take this flight path that i have ever seen. i had a weird experince afterward i tried to contact someone about it to report it and everytime i got through to a person my phone would mysteriously disconect and lose signal and this would only happen with this number. i dont know what it was for sure but the experience was weird i have also seen a series of triangle shaped objects in fresno, ca in 2001 that were seen by many
